text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, so what are ya gonna wear this year? Are you gonna be a witch? Or maybe… a black cat?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Jeez, stop messing around and help me with preparing the food! The ones in charge this year are…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …As it stands, the Ritto dormitory will be in charge of this year's joint dormitory Halloween party.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: And it has been decided that I, Mihono Bourbon, will be the leader of the preparation committee. I look forward to working with you all.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: And Creek and I'll be takin' care of the costumes! Everyone, let's do our best!!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: The costumes will be made in collaboration with the school staff, so if anyone has a desired costume, please fill out the application form.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Anyways, Bourbon, this yer first time bein' in charge, ain't it? Anythin' worryin ya?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Last year Inari was put in charge of Miho. That sure was a mess, huh…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: There is no problem. My mission of ordering sweets for the joint dormitory Halloween party has already concluded.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Continuing with last year's theme, I have also ordered a smoke machine, which has already arrived. It will be loaned out to the equipment committee once a thorough analysis has been conducted.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Wow. Bourbon-chan, you're doing as great a job as ever.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However, when I attempted to turn the smoke machine on in order to conduct a test run, no smoke came out. Therefore, one can reasonably conclude that there is a possibility…

text_block_list.name: Smoke Machine
text_block_list.text: (Beeeeeep!! Pshuuuuu!!!!)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaaa!? Waaaahhh!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Cough… I was worried that there might be some adverse side effects. However, since the smoke consists mainly of water vapor, there should be no harm… Cough.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …You sure yer okay?
Preparations began for the joint dormitory Halloween party. The leader of the preparation committee, Mihono Bourbon was…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Butter for the cooking committee has been acquired. Now I must acquire some light bulbs for the equipment committee. Afterwards, I need to prepare a time table for the information committee, then contact the costume committee, then…
(Bonk! Brunk, Brrrr…!!)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Manufacturing of a spare jack-o-lantern has failed. Therefore, I will prepare this pumpkin as a meal for myself instead…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Preparing guide materials. The Tracen Academy Halloween event was created for international students. However, the event focuses on entertainment rather than nostalgia…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san… She seems so busy… After all, the joint dormitory Halloween party is going to be incredibly large…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: But if we offer to help her without knowing what we're doing, it will just end up causing her to have more work…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice-san?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah… S-Sorry… I… agree with you…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …I really do… But…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: (Nom, munchmunch… Haah…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I wonder if that pumpkin is the failed jack-o-lantern that she had mentioned…)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: All that is left of this pumpkin is… 15kg 600g… This should keep me hydrated…

text_block_list.name: Ritto Student
text_block_list.text: Hey… Bourbon-san. Would you like our help finishing that?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I refuse. You all have your own tasks at hand currently. Not to mention that this is the result of my failure, therefore, I should resolve it on my own.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Rice, people've been lining up behind you for a while now, ya know? If ya want a carrot hamburg steak feel free and get one.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Whaa!? Sorry, I am so sorry! I didn't realize that I had lined up… Umm…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What? Got somethin' to say to Bourbon? Then why doncha just tell her? Go on now.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Bourbon, excuse me. Rice's got somethin' to talk to you about.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-No… I… can't… say it…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Wastin' time by not sayin' anythings just gonna make it harder to say, ya know? Just start the conversation off with somethin' simple. Like how bout the weather?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eeh!? W-Well… Err, umm…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: To… today's weather sure is great, isn't it…?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I agree, it is sunny today.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh…? What's with the tension here? Is this a blind date?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ara ara…
And so the preparations for the Tracen Academy joint dormitory Halloween party began in earnest. Will the girls truly be able to pull it off?
That night…

text_block_list.name: Dorm Student
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaa!!
There was a scream so loud it could deafen the gods above…
